info.title: Cost Center
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update, and delete cost center master data in your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. This service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and other user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete cost centers using this synchronous inbound service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_CostCenterText_2 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
